amendatorysection.para: (1) No individual or entity shall perform, offer to perform, or advertise any service as a navigator in this state unless registered as a navigator by the director.
(a) Engage in any activities that would require an insurance producer license;
(c) Recommend or endorse a particular health plan;

(d) Accept any compensation or consideration from an insurance company, broker, or consultant that is dependent, in whole or in part, on whether a person enrolls in or purchases a qualified health plan; or
(e) Fail to respond to any written inquiry from the director regarding the navigator's duties as a navigator or fail to request additional reasonable time to respond within fifteen working days.
